alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:52PM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Greatest amounts north of Billings, Hardin and Lame Deer. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Northern Big Horn, Southern Big Horn, Southwestern Yellowstone, and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Snow will cause slick roads and areas of poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute today, as well as the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy northwest winds will produce areas of blowing snow and wind chills in the teens below zero tonight and Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone
